item.title: Learning Notes - Getting Started
item.description: I recently spent about 2hrs to learn rust-lang by following this guide - The Rust Programming Language. I wrote down some notes and thoughts about the experiences. This is the first part. Install Rust on macOS X $ curl –proto ‘=https’ –tlsv1.2 https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh The installation process was quite nice. Everything was quite smooth and fast ⚡️. Not quite sure if it was because I chose 1) which is the default installation.
